webforest 0.2.1

Column helper: Reference/citation display

Source: R/classes-components.R
col_reference.Rd

Display truncated text with optional link and full text in tooltip.

col_reference(
  field,
  header = "Reference",
  width = NULL,
  href_field = NULL,
  max_chars = 30,
  icon = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

field

Field name containing the reference text

header

Column header (default "Reference")

width

Column width in pixels (NULL for auto-sizing based on content)

href_field

Optional field name containing URLs for linking

max_chars

Maximum characters to display before truncating (default 30)

icon

Show external link icon when href_field is provided (default TRUE)

...

Additional arguments passed to web_col(), including cell styling: bold, italic, color, bg, emphasis, muted, accent (column names)

Value

A ColumnSpec object

Examples

# Simple truncated text
col_reference("citation")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "citation"
#>  @ header        : chr "Reference"
#>  @ field         : chr "citation"
#>  @ type          : chr "reference"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ reference:List of 3
#>  ..  ..$ hrefField: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ maxChars : num 30
#>  ..  ..$ showIcon : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# With clickable links
col_reference("title", href_field = "doi_url", max_chars = 40)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "title"
#>  @ header        : chr "Reference"
#>  @ field         : chr "title"
#>  @ type          : chr "reference"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ reference:List of 3
#>  ..  ..$ hrefField: chr "doi_url"
#>  ..  ..$ maxChars : num 40
#>  ..  ..$ showIcon : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Without link icon
col_reference("source", href_field = "url", icon = FALSE)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "source"
#>  @ header        : chr "Reference"
#>  @ field         : chr "source"
#>  @ type          : chr "reference"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ reference:List of 3
#>  ..  ..$ hrefField: chr "url"
#>  ..  ..$ maxChars : num 30
#>  ..  ..$ showIcon : logi FALSE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# With per-cell styling
col_reference("citation", emphasis = "is_key")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "citation"
#>  @ header        : chr "Reference"
#>  @ field         : chr "citation"
#>  @ type          : chr "reference"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ reference:List of 3
#>  ..  ..$ hrefField: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ maxChars : num 30
#>  ..  ..$ showIcon : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: chr "is_key"
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL
